title: The Number Must Be Few (1U260)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. Plays to your support area. While you can spot 7 companions, the move limit for this turn is -1 (to a minimum of 1).
Lore:	”'The number must be few, since your hope is in speed and secrecy.'”
Rarity:	U
